text: can you do multiple dynamic pages per hubdb row
for example, i have a case study listing from HubDB, then a dynamic page for the main overview of the case study, then in main overview, have that link to 4 - 5 pages
I think that’s a use case for the nested dynamic pages.
Never personally done it only heard some devs talk about it - I think there’s a HubSpot article about it

But this looks like it could get cumbersome in doing this with case studies as you would have:

```
Main Tables: Client
----Child: Client One
----Child: Client Two
----Child: Client Three
```

unless I am missing something <@U6GNQ7JBU>

So your URLs would then be:
```
/clients/ (main table listing)
/clients/client1 (dynamic page from main table)
/clients/client1/overview (listing from child table for client 1)
/clients/client1/overview/awesome (dynamic page from child table for client 1)
```

Is that how anyone else read it?
So if i have a hubdb row with multiple page id's in one field, How can I loop through those in the best way?
